law.text: If any provisions of KRS 164A.555 to 164A.630 or the application thereof to any persons or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of KRS 164A.555 to 164A.630 which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of KRS 164A.555 to 164A.630 are severable.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 391, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1982.
